sentences.sContent: First off, both people have to sit off to the side of the display, which can cause leaning, slouching, and twisting to get into a position to both see and type.
sentences.sContent_eng: First off, both people have to sit off to the side of the display, which can cause leaning, slouching, and twisting to get into a position to both see and type.
sentences.sCn: 首先，两个人都并非正对显示器，而是偏向显示器的边缘，在敲打键盘或观察显示器时，将会引起相互倚靠、懒散及扭头等情况的发生。

remMethod.val: “似老去” → 没精打采的样子

words.tran: 下垂；笨拙的人，懒散的人；懒散的样子

trans.tranCn: 没精打采的, 懒散的
